name: Herd Community: AMAZEing Exhibition
description:
This game/interactive exhibition is free to play but any DONATIONS will be gratefully received and all proceeds will go towards funding future Creative Change workshops, which offer art and craft activities for people of all ages but particularly those dealing with mental health issues. Please SUPPORT THIS GAME and the great work that they do by offering a small contribution. 

You are invited to join the herd or find out more by going to... 

https://www.facebook.com/IpswichHerdCommunity

http://www.hannaharia.com

https://www.facebook.com/groups/2321953628072369

Can be played online using keyboard and mouse controls or touchscreen on a mobile device.

If you succeed in finding all exhibits and exiting the maze there is a global leaderboard for you to post your time and check your ranking (Hint: The timer will pause while viewing exhibits so don't feel like you have to rush while looking at the artwork). How fast can you complete the game?

Too easy for you? Try turning 'night mode on' and the 'trail off' in options for a harder game mode!

Thank you and I hope you enjoy the game.
